edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.office
Class Thermostat

java.lang.Object
  edu.luc.cs.trull.EmptyComponent

          edu.luc.cs.trull.AbstractComponent
              edu.luc.cs.trull.EmitComponent
                  edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.office.Thermostat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, EventLabels, java.util.EventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, PropertyChangeSource, SchedulerAware, Startable, Suspendable, Terminating
public class Thermostat
extends EmitComponent
implements EventLabels

A simple thermostat. Whenever the ambient temperature is below the desired temperature, the heat is turned on. When the ambient temperature is at least the desired temperature, the heat is turned off.
